title: Vellavi Manasu Karane Lyrics Thilagar
stanzas:
vellavi manasu kaarane
vel kambu inathaane
vellooru sanathu kaarane
vellandhi gunathaane

nee vaeti poattu varum
pottu vachcha aagaayam
thottu thandha vazhamaram
engalukku thaayaagum

ne kovathula ukkaram
aabaththula sakkaram
veedhiyila sandhaiyila
unnaiyum thaan kandaa
padappu katti nikkurom

vellavi manasu kaarane
vel kambu enathaane
vellooru sanathu kaarane
vellandhi gunathaane

ethanaiyo perumai gala
vachirukkum vamsamadaa
sathiyama kulangalile
enga kulam amsamadaa

aathapola engalukkum
illai ingai kadivaalam
aathiramum araivappum
engaloda adaiyaalam

patta saaraayam
inikkum engaambalaika
retta eera kola
irukkum enga pombaikku

nandu cindu persu vara
veeraappa kaatumadaa
unmai enna theriyanuma
ooril vandhu kaetukkadaa

mukkulame sonnaale
ekkulamum varaverkkum
enga akkulalie ennaalum
veecharuvaa irukkum

vellavi manasu kaarane
vel kambu inathaane
vellooru sanathu kaarane
vellandhi gunathaane

munga vachi rasikkradhil
enga sanam dheivamadaa
pangalaainga manasarinji
.. seivomadaa

kopparaiyil ponnalndhu
maappilaikku koduppondaa
108 aadu aruthu
pandhiyila kudippondaa

nenja koduthaakkaa
uruthaa kaappondaa
nanja koduthaakka
nanja koduthaakka
keravam theeppomda

veeramulla thalaimuraiyaa
vazhndhirukkom vazhi vazhiya
maanam kaakka oru thaliyaa
thandhirukkom kola kolayaa

engala pol meesa vachaa
ungalukkum thudipperum
enga sandhadhikka ellorkkum
pasumponne pudikkum

vellavi manasu kaarane
vel kambu inathaane
vellooru sanathu kaarane
vellandhi gunathaane

nee vaeti poattu varum
pottu vachcha aagaayam
thottu thandha vazhamaram
engalukku thaayaagum

ne kovathula ukkaram
aabaththula sakkaram
veedhiyila sandhaiyila
unnaiyum thaan kandaa
padappu katti nikkurom
